table.Name: wcms_Help
table.Title: a_menu_help
table.SQL_SELECT_LIST: declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Help where Help_LanguageID = @langID AND Help_ParentID is not null { AND Help_Title @Search:Help_Title } { AND Help_Content @Search:Help_Content } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 1000 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage select [Help_ID] ,REPLICATE('·····', Help_Level - 1) + ' ' + (case when Help_Level = 1 then '' + Help_Title + '' else Help_Title end) as [Help_Title] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Help_ID] ,[Help_Title] ,[Help_Level] from wcms_Help where Help_LanguageID = @langID AND Help_ParentID is not null { AND Help_Title @Search:Help_Title } { AND Help_Content @Search:Help_Content } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 and @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on select [Help_ID] ,'
' + Help_Title + '
' as [Help_Title] ,[Help_Content] from WCMS_Help where Help_ID = @editID
